attributes.action: Drastically reduce MP and government employee pensions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drastically reduce the amount given to MP and government officials as their pension payments given to them are obscene and unjustified now. This is highlighted even more now how wrong they are, given the amount of tax taken from normal British peoples pensions by this government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
